Html:
Hi Throb,

I see that you are always developing Obtics, thank you, I use it in all my Silverlight projects. It's incredibly powerful. If you need help developing, please let me know.

Best regards,
Vincent BOUZON

Hi Vincent,

Good to hear that Obtics works well for you. :-) I hope it will keep on doing so in the future.

Yes there is still a lot of development to do. One thing that is needed is unittests to check if value transformations handle exceptions properly.

Regards,

Thomas.
